name: Zombie Olympics (Tauheed Game Dev)
description:
This is an Apocalyptic twist on the Olympic games, made for the Xanderwood Summer Jam and the Marlin Olympics Jam

Theme requirements

Opposites Attract - Apocalypse and Olympics are opposites so bringing them together for the theme (A bit farfetched I know)

No Balls - Not a single ball can be seen in this game, except maybe the moon but that technically isn't a ball.

Olympics - the Game is based on the 100m Sprint

You can play single player and post your best times on my Discord, or you can play Local Multiplayer up to 4 players on the same keyboard.

If you enjoy this game leave a comment below and let me know what events you would like me to add next.
